text: John Wesley Hillman (March 29, 1832 - March 19, 1915) was an American prospector during the California Gold Rush. He was also an explorer who was among the first European Americans to see Crater Lake in the U.S. state of Oregon. He is credited with discovering the lake. == References == Category:1832 births Category:1915 deaths Category:People from New York (state)
title: John Wesley Hillman
